data.text: Aluongi, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, yie ibi ira piyo.
Mad lamona osiki e nyimi mana ka ubani miwangʼo,
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, ket jarit e dhoga;
Kik iyie gimoro amora marach ywa chunya,
Onego ngʼat makare ema ogoya, nikech mano chalo tim ngʼwono motimona;
chiengʼ ma nowit ruodhigi piny koa ewi got mabor,
Giniwach niya, “Mana kaka ngʼato puro kendo toyo lowo,
Anto atego wangʼa kuomi, yaye Jehova Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto;
Kik iwe obadho ma gisechikona maka,
Mad joma timbegi richogo moki e gokegi giwegi
